commands.name: az sig create
commands.syntax:
az sig create --gallery-name
              --resource-group
              [--description]
              [--eula]
              [--location]
              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
              [--permissions {Community, Groups, Private}]
              [--public-name-prefix]
              [--publisher-contact]
              [--publisher-uri]
              [--soft-delete {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
              [--tags]

commands.name: az sig create
commands.syntax:
az sig create --gallery-name
              --resource-group
              [--description]
              [--eula]
              [--location]
              [--permissions {Community, Groups, Private}]
              [--public-name-prefix]
              [--publisher-email]
              [--publisher-uri]
              [--soft-delete {false, true}]
              [--tags]

commands.name: az sig delete
commands.syntax:
az sig delete [--gallery-name]
              [--ids]
              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
              [--resource-group]
              [--subscription]

commands.name: az sig list
commands.summary: List galleries under a resource group.

commands.name: az sig list-community
commands.summary: List all community galleries shared directly to your subscription or tenant.

commands.name: az sig list-shared
commands.summary: List all shared galleries shared directly to your subscription or tenant.

commands.name: az sig show
commands.summary: Retrieve information about a Shared Image Gallery.
commands.syntax:
az sig show [--gallery-name]
            [--ids]
            [--resource-group]
            [--select {Permissions}]
            [--sharing-groups {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
            [--subscription]

commands.name: az sig show-community
commands.summary: Get a community gallery by gallery public name.

commands.name: az sig show-community
commands.summary: Get a gallery that has been community (preview).

commands.name: az sig show-shared
commands.summary: Get a gallery that has been shared directly to your subscription or tenant.

commands.name: az sig update
commands.syntax:
az sig update [--add]
              [--eula]
              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
              [--gallery-name]
              [--ids]
              [--location]
              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
              [--permissions {Community, Groups, Private}]
              [--public-name-prefix]
              [--publisher-contact]
              [--publisher-uri]
              [--remove]
              [--resource-group]
              [--set]
              [--soft-delete {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
              [--subscription]
examples: az sig update --resource-group myResourceGroup --gallery-name myGallery --permissions groups

az sig update -g myResourceGroup --gallery-name myGallery --permissions Community --publisher-uri myPublisherUri --publisher-email myPublisherEmail --eula myEula --public-name-prefix myPublicNamePrefix

commands.name: az sig wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
